name: support
description: Issue with a support-like question

name: new functionality request
description: Issue with a request to add functionality

name: bug report
description: Issue raised reporting a potential bug

name: bug fix
description: Pull Request raised fixing a potential bug

name: docs
description: Any Issue/Pull Request that related to documentation

name: technical-debt
description: Any Issue that raises changes that should be done, and any Pull Request that does them

name: status: needs more information
description: An Issue reporting a potential bug that needs more detail in order to help reproduce it

name: resolution: can't reproduce
description: An Issue reporting a bug that cannot be reproduced

name: resolution: duplicate
description: An Issue raised that has already been reported

name: resolution: fixed
description: An Issue that has been fixed by a Pull Request

name: resolution: invalid
description: An Issue that is determined to not be related to this project

name: resolution: won't fix
description: An Issue reporting behaviour that is not intended to be changed in the future

name: resolution: works as expected
description: An Issue reporting a bug that is actually normal behaviour

name: keep open
description: An Issue or Pull Request that should be kept open

name: for new contributors
description: An Issue raising a need for changes, that should be relatively easy to do

name: status: confirmed
description: An Issue reporting a bug that is confirmed to affect other users

name: status: unconfirmed
description: An Issue reporting a potential bug that is yet to be confirmed by other users

name: security
description: Any Issue or Pull Request that directly relates to security

name: type: chore
description: A Pull Request that is raised as part of routine module maintenance

name: type: feature
description: A Pull Request raised that adds completely new functionality

name: type: enhancement
description: A Pull Request raised that enhances existing functionality

name: type: refactor
description: A Pull Request raised that involves a large number of changes to module design

name: type: test
description: A Pull Request raised that adds one or more tests

name: type: deprecation
description: A Pull Request raised that deprecates existing functionality

name: needs: docs
description: A Pull Request raised that needs associated documentation changes

name: needs: feedback
description: A Pull Request raised that should be discussed and reviewed by others due to the type of change

name: needs: review
description: A Pull Request that should have more than one reviewer approve before merging

name: needs: work
description: A Pull Request that should not be merged yet, due to feedback needing to be addressed, or more work being performed

name: needs: breaking change
description: A Pull Request raised changes the interface in a way that is not backwards-compatible

name: needs: rebase
description: A Pull Request that needs a git rebase

name: needs: tests
description: A Pull Request should also be providing matching tests or test changes

name: do not merge
description: A Pull Request that the author requests not be merged right now

name: help wanted
description: A Pull Request that could do with assistance to complete

name: stale
description: A Pull Request or Issue that has had no activity for some time
